label: MedicalTrialDesign
comment: Design models for medical trials. Enumerated type.

enumerationMembers.label: DoubleBlindedTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial design in which neither the researcher nor the patient knows the details of the treatment the patient was randomly assigned to.

enumerationMembers.label: MultiCenterTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial that takes place at multiple centers.

enumerationMembers.label: OpenTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial design in which the researcher knows the full details of the treatment, and so does the patient.

enumerationMembers.label: SingleBlindedTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial design in which the researcher knows which treatment the patient was randomly assigned to but the patient does not.

enumerationMembers.label: SingleCenterTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial that takes place at a single center.

enumerationMembers.label: TripleBlindedTrial
enumerationMembers.comment: A trial design in which neither the researcher, the person administering the therapy nor the patient knows the details of the treatment the patient was randomly assigned to.
